root.name: Eliss
root.description: Overview Created by Steph Thirion, Eliss is a puzzle game the requires the player to move different color circles (described as planets) in to open circles (described as squeesars), but the squeesars must be the same size as the planets. Once this is accomplished, the planet will disappear and the player's gauge will be filled. The goal is to fill the gauge by removing planets from play, but planets of different colors cannot touch each other.
